section.title: Power and volume
section.para: Before we turn the power on, make sure you have attached the battery and antenna as described in chapter 3.

section.title: Turning the unit on
section.para: To turn the unit on, simply rotate the volume/power knob clockwise until you hear a "click". The backlight and display should now have come on.

section.title: Turning the unit off
section.para: Turn the volume/power knob counter-clock wise all the way until you hear a "click". The unit is now off.

section.title: Channel selection.
section.para: Use the [up] and [down] keys to navigate between channels.

section.title: Making a call
section.para: Press and hold the PTT button on the side of the radio body while speaking 3-5cm from the microphone. When you release the PTT your transceiver will go back to receive mode.
